messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

archiving view issue sent wednesday re mailbox almost full issue hi thank you for assistance lot space cleared also extra mailbox very welcomed regarding settings you mentioned below archive folder assign policy button however what archive options for example when select actual archive folder these visible options if select folder within archive folder these options any further assistance selecting month archive policy would be much appreciated regards senior tester sent mailbox almost full issue hello please be advised we have set archiving option for your mailbox left side your screen folder appear named archive after complete synchronization takes place approximately hours your tab tags section assign policy become available click list archive policy select months having option enabled older than months get archived creating more space your mailbox view be similar one print screen please check status your mailbox quota if improves after hours have passed also your mailbox size increased by best regards analyst ext hub sent thursday mailbox almost full issue hi for last couple months keep receiving warning mailbox almost full have delayed inevitable by deleting lot unnecessary by archiving older than st november fixed issue up until what more delete archive any suggestions regards senior tester
